forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. West southwest wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun ascends, its golden light spills across Downtown San Francisco, painting a canvas of clarity and warmth. The day is characterized by a serene blue sky, punctuated only by the gentle brush of a south-southwest wind, offering a refreshing breath against the backdrop of the city’s vibrant architecture. As the morning unfolds, temperatures will hover around a pleasant 65 degrees, gradually softening to the mid-60s, revealing not just a promising warmth but a feeling that embraces the essence of the Bay.

As twilight approaches, the glow will pleasantly shift, whispering tales of a clear night ahead. With temperatures dipping to around 50 degrees, the air will turn crisp, inviting light layers—a soft sweater or a light jacket will suffice as the stars begin to twinkle above. This evening feels perfect for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or perhaps a visit to a cozy café, where the aroma of coffee mingles with the faint sounds of the city, ticking softly in harmony with the cooling air. Best to leave behind the usual clichés of a day at the park; today calls for simple pleasures and an embrace of the urban spirit, unhindered by fog yet adorned in a shimmering calm.
